main event: A USAF B-26 crew sighted a round, glowing object hovering above a wooded area near Lititz, Pennsylvania on September 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object was approximately 20-25 feet in diameter,It hovered at an altitude of 300-400 feet,The object made no audible sound,The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes before the object rapidly climbed and disappeared,The report was part of the official Project Blue Book investigation.
witness description: USAF B-26 crew making a routine inspection flight
